00079 class shiftDevice

00096

00117 class shiftStepMotor : public shiftDevice
00118 {
00119         private:
00120                 uint8_t         stepState;              // Current index in the step sequence
00121                 int16_t         stepSpeed;              // Sign gives directions, __maxMotorSpeed - magnitude + 1 is the number of timer ticks per step
00122                 uint8_t         lastStep;               // Number of timer ticks since last step
00123                 int16_t         stepsToGo;              // Number of steps to go until we finish the current set; set to -1 for continuous rotation
00124                 const uint8_t           *sequence;              // An array of pin configurations that correspond to the steps
00125                 uint8_t         seqSteps;               // Number of steps in the sequence of switch positions
00126                 uint8_t         channels[__channelsPerMotor__];         // The array of channels in the board that correspond to the drive channels for this motor, measured in bits
00127                 uint8_t         chanCount;              // Number of channels in the array 
00128                 void            incrSeq (void); // Increment the step sequence by 1
00129                 void            decrSeq (void); // Decrement the step sequence by 1
00130         public:
00132                 shiftStepMotor (
00133                                                         // the number of steps in the sequence 
00134                                                 const uint8_t seqSteps,         
00135                                                         // an array of switch position, expressed as integers
00136                                                 const uint8_t *sequence,        
00137                                                         // the channel numbers on the board occupied by this device (always 4 elements long)
00138                                                 const uint8_t *channels);       
00140                 uint8_t         incrStep (int8_t dir);                                          
00142                 uint8_t         doSteps (int16_t steps, int16_t speed); 
00144                 uint8_t         setSpeed (int16_t speed);                               
00146                 int16_t         getSpeed (void);                                                        
00148                 int16_t         getStepsToGo (void);                                            
00150                 uint8_t         getSeqStep (void);                                                      
00152                 void            doDevTick (uint8_t bytesPerBoard, 
00153                                                            uint8_t *boardBytes);
00154 };

00321 class shiftChain
00322 {
00323         private:
00324                 shiftBoard      **boards;                       // array of pointers to the board objects
00325                 uint8_t         boardCount;                     // number of boards in the chain
00326                 uint8_t         byteCount;                      // nuber of bytes in the chain
00327                 uint8_t         timerPrescaler;         // prescaler value to set timer frequency
00328                 uint8_t         timerVal;                       // the value the timer starts off at after each tick
00329                                                                                 // together, these two values control the tick frequency
00330                 uint8_t         timer;                          // the timer number we're using
00331                 uint8_t         dataPort;                       // shift register data pin
00332                 uint8_t         clockPort;                      // shift register clock pin
00333                 uint8_t         latchPort;                      // shift register latch pin
00334                 uint8_t         resetPort;                      // shift register master reset pin
00335                 uint8_t         indexPort;                      // index pin to indicate when the interrupt is running
00336                 uint8_t         dataPinMask;            // shift register data pin
00337                 uint8_t         clockPinMask;           // shift register clock pin
00338                 uint8_t         latchPinMask;           // shift register latch pin
00339                 uint8_t         resetPinMask;           // shift register master reset pin
00340                 uint8_t         indexPinMask;           // index pin
00341                 uint8_t         indexFlag;                      // flag to determine whether or not index pin is enabled
00342                 volatile uint8_t        *clk;           // port register for clock pin
00343                 volatile uint8_t        *dat;           // port register for data pin
00344                 volatile uint8_t        *lat;           // port register for latch pin
00345                 volatile uint8_t        *rst;           // port register for master reset pin
00346                 volatile uint8_t        *ind;           // port register for index pin
00347                 void            fastShiftOut (uint8_t *bytes);
00348                                                                                 // shift them bits out quick!
00349         public: 
00351                 shiftChain (
00352                                         uint8_t boardCount, 
00353                                         shiftBoard      **boards, 
00354                                         uint8_t dataPin, 
00355                                         uint8_t clockPin,
00356                                         uint8_t latchPin,
00357                                         uint8_t resetPin);
00359                 shiftChain (
00360                                         uint8_t boardCount, 
00361                                         shiftBoard      **boards, 
00362                                         uint8_t dataPin, 
00363                                         uint8_t clockPin,
00364                                         uint8_t latchPin,
00365                                         uint8_t resetPin,
00366                                         uint8_t indexPin);                              
00368                 uint8_t         getBoardCount (void);
00370                 shiftBoard      *getBoard (uint8_t index);
00372                 uint8_t         startTimer (
00373                                         uint8_t prescaler, 
00374                                         uint8_t timerVal, 
00375                                         uint8_t timer);
00377                 uint8_t         stopTimer (void);
00379                 void            doTick (void);
00380 };
